title: Course on Strengthening Mathematics Learning Competencies Using Smartphones

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing self-directed learning strategies using smartphones to improve mathematical learning efficiency for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can select three or more smartphone-based math problem-solving apps appropriately according to situational contexts
Learners can analyze and report on one educational app by applying the SERVQUAL framework-based service quality evaluation criteria
Learners can establish an efficient learning environment of at least two hours per day by applying smartphone data/battery optimization techniques
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
